thread.title: Fabio finds ‘Destiny’ unique and well-written
thread.title_full: Fabio finds ‘Destiny’ unique and well-written | mb.com.ph | Philippine News

author: Jon Montesa
title: Fabio finds ‘Destiny’ unique and well-written
text:
by Jon Montesa
October 6, 2015 Fabio Ide
Fabio Ide has a memorable TV character in Gabriele, a Filipino-Italian who falls in love with a transgender woman on “Destiny Rose” starring Ken Chan.
The Brazilian-Japanese actor-model admits taking on the character is a big challenge.
“It’s not easy when you’re straight guy and you have to (do romantic scenes with another guy),” Fabio told Bulletin Entertainment.
He hopes the role would help further develop his skills as actor.
“Talaga ibibigay ko ang best ko sa show na ’to kasi this is a once in a lifetime opportunity. It will allow people to see what I am capable of as an actor,” he said.
The actor-model likes it that the story is “very nice, very unique and well-written.”
Fabio, who is in a relationship with beauty queen-actress Bianca Manalo, doesn’t consider his character gay though.
“The way the story would unfold, my character won’t be aware that he’s dating a guy. All along he thinks he is a girl so, it’s not a gay role,” he said.
How is it working with Ken? According to Fabio, it has been “amazing.”
“Ken is such a mabait person and super magaling siya umarte. He’s very easy to work with. He also wants everyone around him to do good also,” he said, noting how Ken would often go out of his way to help him deliver his Tagalog lines.
“So it’s just really nice that I was given this opportunity to work with him because he’s just really that good,” he added.
The 31-year-old is happy with how his career is going at the moment.
“I think everything is just so perfect.. with my daughter Danielle (with former girlfriend Denisse Oca) and Bianca… It’s too good to be true and I’m just really enjoying and trying to make the most out of it,” he said.
“Destiny Rose” also stars Katrina Halili, Manilyn Reynes, Jackie Lou Blanco, Irma Adlawan, Joko Diaz, Sheena Halili, Jeric Gonzales and JC Tiuseco. The show airs weekdays on GMA Afternoon Prime.
